tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claimant_name VARCHAR(50),
    claim_date DATE,
    settlement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE Settlement_Records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INT,
  settlement_date DATE,
  settlement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  settlement_status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES Liability_Insurance_Claims(claim_id)
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_policies (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_id INT,
  policy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  policy_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES insurance_companies(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  claim_date DATE NOT NULL,
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES insurance_policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE claim_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INT,
  settlement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  settlement_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES insurance_claims(claim_id)
);

CREATE TABLE claim_report (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  history_id INT,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  report_summary TEXT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (history_id) REFERENCES claim_history(history_id)
);
